constituent: acid, whiskey bottle, streetwalker, Ministry of silly walks, John Cleese, license, elbow, human legs, walking legs
koohiiStory1: The prostitute carries an old whiskey bottle filled with acid to throw at any difficult Johns.
koohiiStory2: Dealing alcohol requires a license, dealing acid requires fast legs (to run from the police).
